programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat!
programme.desc: Throughout this delectable series, international food creative, Rachel Khoo delves into the world of chocolate, taking inspiration from around the globe to create original, mouth-watering dishes. Super-chef Rachel, who trained at Le Cordon Bleu in Paris, meets some of the finest chocolatiers in Europe, investigates the fascinating history of chocolate and explores the health and wellbeing benefits of our favourite treat.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films & Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Teddies 2
programme.desc: Dom is having lots of fun playing his bongo drums, but his friends can't concentrate in their activities because of how loud it is. In the end, Dom builds a 'loud and quiet teddy clock' so they can all take turns being loud and quiet. Later, Meeks works on a special surprise project that he doesn't want his friends to find out about. However, when Dom, Tizzy and Sparky see a wrapped present in the living room, they can't wait to find out who it's for.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3
programme.desc: When Sneeze and Hiccup notice that storytellers have the power to make things come true, they take turns trying this theory out on each other.

programme.title: School Of Roars S1
programme.desc: Five little monsters go on all sorts of fun adventures at their school with the help of their kind teacher Miss Grizzlesniff!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3
programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. And we learn much more about each of the Go Jetters too. Travelling from the top of the planet to the very bottom, their action-packed adventures take them to truly incredible places. And there's a good chance Grandmaster Glitch has got there first to cause his usual chaos!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S6
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S7
programme.desc: Captain Redbeard is losing his marbles! The children have to make a cranberry shake o return him to normal. But only Parrot knows the recipe, and he's nowhere nearby! Will they be able to make Redbeard normal again? The children camp in the Jungle to earn merit badges. Tim thinks he's good at everything but finds out he isn't. He learns to accept everyone's strengths and weaknesses.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S1
programme.desc: The Rangers have to save the unique animals at a hydrothermal vent. The Rangers rescue a giant catfish.

programme.title: Zoom The White Dolphin S1

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series S24
programme.desc: It's a big, big world, but you know where to find Ash and Goh---battling and catching Pokemon from Kanto to Galar! With Pikachu, Cinderace, and their other Pokemon beside them, our heroes continue to travel all over the world to research Pokemon for Cerise Laboratory.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger: S3 Spinoff
programme.desc: There is an insect on Zari's plant that looks like an alien. The Junior Rangers must bring it to a safe place so that it does not get hurt after shedding its skin.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger: S3 Spinoff
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers spot a small deer in the forest without any antlers. Worried for its safety, the rangers attempt to protect it from harm. However, they soon learn that the small animal has other ways to defend itself. Watch to find out what they are!

They try to track the lead suspect Vaughn who seems to have electrical malfunctions following him all day. But Jake not being able to control his powers could put the team in great danger as they try to find the villain who is absorbing all the electricity. And when Jake gets into a electrical battle with the villain, things get out of hand.

programme.title: Rituals
programme.desc: In every culture, our rituals reveal what it means to be human. They allow us to express our identity, join us together and help us navigate through life. This visually stunning series uses cinematic filming techniques to immerse viewers in incredible rituals practised by cultures across the globe, from the cities of Japan to the jungles of New Guinea. These surprising rituals touch on moments we all experience - from birth and death to marriage and funerals.
